mapper.insert: insert into t_item_info (item_no, item_subno, item_barcode, item_name, item_class, item_property, item_brand, item_size, item_unit_no, item_in_price, item_sale_price, item_pf_price, item_vip_price, item_dist_price, item_area, item_grade, item_sup_no, counter_no, item_combine, item_SaleMode, item_flag, have_stock, Manage_type, Manage_ly_rate, py_code, item_valid_day, item_valid_tipday, pos_lower_price, pos_discount, change_price, allow_discount, in_tax_rate, out_tax_rate, item_sale_rate, item_pf_rate, integral_rate, cost_type, display_flag, internal_flag, item_memo, item_bytxt1, item_bytxt2, item_bytxt3, item_bynum1, item_bynum2, item_bynum3, IsSysFlag, lock_user, create_date, create_user, modify_date, modify_user, update_flow, item_sale_ratetype, eshop_Integral, trans_upflag, item_jj, item_ks ) values (#{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemSubno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemUnitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemInPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemIsgood,jdbcType=CHAR},

#{itemQiRep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{itemDistQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{transUpflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemJj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemKs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select a.item_barcode as itemBarcode, (sum(b.stock_qty) - sum(b.sale_qty) - sum(b.sending_qty)) as realQty, a.item_in_price as stockAmt from t_item_info a, tmp_branch_stock b where a.item_no = b.item_no group by a.item_no
